detail_desc: 5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs. Soft jersey lining for extra warmth.
Sleeveless, fitted one-shoulder top in jersey with a sheen. Lined at the top.
Sleeveless, fitted one-shoulder top in jersey with a sheen. Lined at the top.
Sleeveless, fitted one-shoulder top in jersey with a sheen. Lined at the top.
Wide-fitting, sleeveless top in slub cotton jersey with wide shoulder straps, a gathered seam at the top and woven fabric edges with broderie anglaise at the hem.
Wide-fitting, sleeveless top in slub cotton jersey with wide shoulder straps, a gathered seam at the top and woven fabric edges with broderie anglaise at the hem.
Wide-fitting, sleeveless top in slub cotton jersey with wide shoulder straps, a gathered seam at the top and woven fabric edges with broderie anglaise at the hem.

Wide blouse in an airy weave with a tie-top V-neck, dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
Glittery trainers with an imitation suede tongue, an adjustable hook and loop fastening at the front and a loop at the back. Fleece linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Belt with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.

Short, smocked top in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an overlocked hem.
Short, smocked top in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an overlocked hem.

Short, padded jacket woven in a cotton blend with a stand-up collar that is ribbed on the inside and a zip and press-studs down the front. Side pockets and a sleeve pocket with a concealed zip, one inner pocket with a press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined. Polyester filling.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy weave with a high waist, concealed zip at the back, inner shorts and straight, wide legs with scalloped, broderie anglaise trims at the hems.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with fake welt pockets at the back. High waist with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at one side, and slim legs with creases.
Straight-cut, pattern-weave jacket with notch lapels and welt front pockets with a flap. No buttons. Lined.
Straight-cut, pattern-weave jacket with notch lapels and welt front pockets with a flap. No buttons. Lined.
Straight-cut, pattern-weave jacket with notch lapels and welt front pockets with a flap. No buttons. Lined.
Straight-cut, pattern-weave jacket with notch lapels and welt front pockets with a flap. No buttons. Lined.

Set with a top, shorts and sun hat in cotton. Jersey top with a small text print at the top, short flounced sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck.Shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated waist and elasticated hems. Sun hat in a patterned weave with ties at the chin and a cotton lining.
Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a round neckline that has a small opening and concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and cuffs with two buttons. Unlined.
Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a round neckline that has a small opening and concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and cuffs with two buttons. Unlined.

Round metal clip earrings. Diameter approx. 3.6 cm.
Fitted strappy top in stretch, ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck front and back.
Fitted strappy top in stretch, ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck front and back.
Soft bootees in pile with felt appliqués on the front and ribbing at the top. Jersey lining. Soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Base layer top in fast-drying, jacquard-patterned, functional fabric with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Seamless.
Base layer tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details and ribbing at the waist and hems. Seamless.
Pull-on trousers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Zipped side pockets, back pockets, and tapered legs that are gathered at the hems.

Trousers in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, zipped side pockets, and back pockets with decorative seams. Tapered, shaped legs with seams at the knees.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and press-stud.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts, fixed lacing at the front, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and fixed lacing at the sides.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Knee-socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Running top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with jacquard-patterned sections and reflective details. Hood and zip at the top, and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Seamless.
Briefs in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Socks in a soft, fine knit containing glittery threads.

Shirt in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short, checked skirt in a textured weave with a high waist and visible zip in one side. Lined.

Sleeveless, V-neck blouse in woven fabric with a small frill trim around the neckline and ties at the top. Decorative gathers at the shoulders and a seam under the bust that is elasticated at the back.
Wide pull-on trousers in stripe-print viscose crêpe with an elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams and straight legs with a seam at the hems.
